extendedInfo.description: 'Keep Calm & Carry On' is a fun App that allows you to customise and create your own versions of the classic posters!During World War II the British Government printed thousands of the classic 'Keep Calm and Carry On' poster to boost morale - you can now create your own!Change the words, pictures and backgrounds to amuse and impress your friends.You can then share your custom poster and email to friends or set as your wall paper!Features..,â Simple controlsâ Wide selection of imagesâ Completely customisable text

reviews.title: Can\'t share!
reviews.comment: This app is a shit app it can\'t share!!! And there is too little icons and colours!! Fix this shit!! And must pay!!!????? Shit!!
reviews.author: Daylan Ronaldo

reviews.title: It\'s the wrong typeface
reviews.comment: Font needs to be bigger and you need to be able to save to SD card rather than screen shot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: wrong font!
reviews.comment: It\'s the wrong font and everything! Looks totally rubbish and can\'t even share.  Get the other one by Esteth. Same price but proper font and can share.  Don\'t waste your time!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
